pr_title: Allow the lab secret to not come from testUtils' BuildConfig

timeline.message: Add backup strategy for finding lab secret, enable LabUserHelper to reset the value

timeline.bodyText: Can we collapse these into one catch block?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: Yes, just not the way I have my studio set up.  I'll fix it.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: to distinguish the case where I've already searched the class path and not found anything from the one where I have not yet looked through everything.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.author: shahzaibj

timeline.bodyText: Is this constructor being used anywhere?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

timeline.bodyText: Can we just get from classpath directly? without first checking for it in test utils
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: I want to give testUtils some sense of priority, to avoid disrupting anything that's currently in use.  If you're currently consuming testUtils as source, and aren't overriding the behavior by calling the methods that use the secret directly, then it should work just like it used to.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

replies.bodyText: And I can't find it in the class path anyway, without making build changes I'm not willing to make.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.author: shahzaibj
AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.bodyText: Does this actually reset the LabAuthenticationHelper instance? It seems like getInstance(String keyVaultSecret) only uses the secret provided if the instance is null, otherwise it simply returns the old instance back.
timeline.author: irving-as

replies.bodyText: Good catch.  We must not be using it elsewhere in the tests, otherwise my attempt would not have worked.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.bodyText: These two lines can be collapsed into one
timeline.author: shahzaibj
shahzaibj

timeline.message: Add backup strategy for finding lab secret, enable LabUserHelper to reset the value
Add changes to allow for module overriding
Check that the lab secret is different and then reset the authhelper instance
Remove needless gradle change, add documentation
Inline lines.  Add function to wipe cache.
Inline lines.  Add function to wipe cache.
